languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, честное псайкерское, дело серьезное! Никогда меня еще так мраком не крыло. Я не ослепла, наоборот — я вижу его. И только его".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, честное псайкерское, дело серьезное! Никогда меня еще так мраком не крыло. Я не ослепла, наоборот — я вижу его. И только его".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, this is serious, take a psyker's word for it! Darkness has never shrouded me like this before. But I have not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, честное псайкерское, дело серьезное! Никогда меня еще так мраком не крыло. Я не ослепла, наоборот — я вижу его. И только его".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, this is serious, take a psyker's word for it! Never been wrapped in darkness like that before, I haven't. I'm not blind. On the contrary, I see it. And it's the only thing I see."
"Lord Captain, this is serious, take a psyker's word for it! Never been wrapped in darkness like that before, I haven't. I'm not blind. On the contrary, I see it. And it's the only thing I see."

"Lord Captain, this is serious, take a psyker's word for it! Darkness has never shrouded me like this before. But I have not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

"Lord Captain, this is serious, take a psyker's word for it! Darkness has never shrouded me like this before. But I have not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

"Lord Captain, this is serious, take a psyker's word for it! Darkness has never shrouded me like this before. But I have not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

"Lord Captain, this is serious, take a psyker's word for it! Darkness has never shrouded me like this before. But I have not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

languages.text: "Lord Captain, das ist ernst, glaubt einer Psionikerin! Die Dunkelheit hat mich noch nie zuvor so umhüllt. Doch ich bin nicht blind geworden, nein. Es ist die Dunkelheit, die ich sehe. Sie ist das Einzige, was ich sehe."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this is serious, take a psyker's word for it! Darkness has never shrouded me like this before. But I have not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, das ist ernst, glaubt einer Psionikerin! Die Dunkelheit hat mich noch nie zuvor so umhüllt. Doch ich bin nicht blind geworden, nein. Es ist die Dunkelheit, die ich sehe. Sie ist das Einzige, was ich sehe."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, c'est sérieux, c'est une psyker qui vous le dit ! Les ténèbres ne m'avaient jamais enveloppée de la sorte. Mais je ne suis pas devenue aveugle, non. Je vois les ténèbres. Je ne vois plus que ça. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this is serious, take a psyker's word for it! Darkness has never shrouded me like this before. But I have not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, c'est sérieux, c'est une psyker qui vous le dit ! Les ténèbres ne m'avaient jamais enveloppée de la sorte. Mais je ne suis pas devenue aveugle, non. Je vois les ténèbres. Je ne vois plus que ça. »

languages.text: “舰长大人，我是认真的，相信我这个灵能者的话吧！我从来没像这样突然身处黑暗之中。我的眼睛没瞎，真的没瞎。我只看到了黑暗，其它什么都看不到。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this is serious, take a psyker's word for it! Darkness has never shrouded me like this before. But I have not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我是认真的，相信我这个灵能者的话吧！我从来没像这样突然身处黑暗之中。我的眼睛没瞎，真的没瞎。我只看到了黑暗，其它什么都看不到。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、大変よ、異能者の言葉を信じて！これほどまでに闇に覆われたことはない。でも、視力を失ったわけじゃない。見えているのは闇。それしか見えないわ」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this is serious, take a psyker's word for it! Darkness has never shrouded me like this before. But I have not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、大変よ、異能者の言葉を信じて！これほどまでに闇に覆われたことはない。でも、視力を失ったわけじゃない。見えているのは闇。それしか見えないわ」

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán, esto es serio, acepte la palabra de una psíquica! La oscuridad nunca me había envuelto así. Pero no me he quedado sin visión, no. Es la oscuridad lo que veo. Es lo único que veo».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this is serious, take a psyker's word for it! Darkness has never shrouded me like this before. But I have not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán, esto es serio, acepte la palabra de una psíquica! La oscuridad nunca me había envuelto así. Pero no me he quedado sin visión, no. Es la oscuridad lo que veo. Es lo único que veo».

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bu ciddi bir mesele. Ruhsezer olarak bana güven! Karanlık daha önce hiç beni böylesine sarmamıştı. Kör olmadım gerçi, hayır. Karanlığı görüyorum. Tek gördüğüm bu."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this is serious, take a psyker's word for it! Darkness has never shrouded me like this before. But I have not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, bu ciddi bir mesele. Ruhsezer olarak bana güven! Karanlık daha önce hiç beni böylesine sarmamıştı. Kör olmadım gerçi, hayır. Karanlığı görüyorum. Tek gördüğüm bu."
